bill_title: to revise and remove certain segments of the state trunk highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise and remove certain segments of the state trunk highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-4-211 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-211. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Pennington County: From a point on U.S. Highway 16B northeast of Rapid City south of the north quarter corner of section thirty-two, township two north, range eight east, northeasterly via Box Elder to the end of the divided highway in Box Elder in section twenty, township two north, range nine east to near the Elk Vale Road interchange on Interstate 90 . Section 2. That § 31-4-188 be repealed. 31-4-188. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Union county: From a point on Interstate Highway 29 in North Sioux City in section fifteen, township eighty-nine north, range forty-eight west, thence northwest via North Sioux City and Jefferson to Interstate Highway 29 west of Jefferson near the northeast corner of section twenty-four, township ninety north, range forty-nine west. Section 3. That § 31-4-231 be repealed. 31-4-231. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Fall River county: From the west railroad right-of-way in the southwest quarter of section two, township ten south, range two east at the former site of Igloo, thence northeasterly to State Highway 471 in section one, township ten south, range two east. Section 4. That § 31-4-238 be repealed. 31-4-238. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Pennington county: From a point south of Interstate Highway 90 at New Underwood near the southeast corner of section thirty, township two north, range eleven east, thence north to Interstate Highway 90 north of the southwest corner of section thirty, township two north, range eleven east. Section 5. That § 31-4-239 be repealed. 31-4-239. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Pennington county: From a point on State Highway 230 in Box Elder north of the southwest corner of section twenty, township two north, range nine east, thence north to Interstate Highway 90 near the west quarter corner of section twenty, township two north, range nine east.
